Class ServalStatusReceiver

java.lang.Object
  android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      org.magdaaproject.utils.serval.ServalStatusReceiver

public class ServalStatusReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver

a utility class used to receive notification about the state of the serval mesh application
